registration_success.title: Registration Success
registration_success.heading: Registration Succeeded!
registration_success.message: Thank you for registering! A confirmation email has been sent to your inbox. Please check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

confirmation_email_resent.title: Email Resent
confirmation_email_resent.heading: Email Resent Successfully!
confirmation_email_resent.message: We've resent the confirmation email to your inbox. Please check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

confirmation_email_resend_failure.title: Invalid user
confirmation_email_resend_failure.heading: Invalid user
confirmation_email_resend_failure.message: User is invalid or is already confirmed.

confirmation_success.title: Confirmation Success
confirmation_success.heading: Congratulations!
confirmation_success.message: Your email has been successfully confirmed. You have completed the registration process and can now log in.

confirmation_failure.title: Confirmation Failure
confirmation_failure.heading: Confirmation Attempt Failed
confirmation_failure.message: The token was invalid or expired. Please double-check the link or request another token here.

request_password_reset_email_sent.title: Password Reset Email Sent
request_password_reset_email_sent.heading: Password Reset Email Sent
request_password_reset_email_sent.message: If your provided email is associated with us, instructions for resetting your password have been sent. Check your inbox and follow the provided link to reset your password.

password_reset_failure.title: Password Reset Failure
password_reset_failure.heading: Password Reset Failed
password_reset_failure.message: The token was invalid or expired. Please double-check the link or request another token here.

password_change_success.title: Password Change Success
password_change_success.heading: Password Changed Successfully
password_change_success.message: Your password has been updated successfully. You can now log in securely with your new password.

feedback_success.title: Feedback Received
feedback_success.heading: Thank You for Your Feedback
feedback_success.message: We've received your feedback. It will be reviewed as we work towards improving our platform. If you have any further comments or questions, feel free to get in touch.
